title: Student Pass
description: Ideal for students looking to attend the conference.
info: With the Student Pass, you can access all conference sessions and learn from industry experts. It's a great opportunity to kickstart your career in freelancing.

title: Early Bird Pass
description: Get early access and save on conference registration.
info: The Early Bird Pass allows you to access conference sessions before the general public and network with fellow freelancers. Start your freelancing journey on the right foot.

title: Standard Pass
description: Standard pass with access to all conference sessions.
info: The Standard Pass provides comprehensive access to conference content, networking opportunities, and event materials. Enhance your freelancing skills and grow your network.

title: VIP Pass
description: Experience the conference like a VIP.
info: With the VIP Pass, you'll enjoy a premium experience at the conference. Access exclusive areas, enjoy priority seating, and network with top freelancers and industry leaders.

title: Group Pass (5+)
description: Discounted rate for groups of 5 or more.
info: The Group Pass is perfect for teams and organizations. Get a discounted rate and empower your team with valuable freelancing insights and skills.

title: Single Day Pass
description: Access to conference sessions for a single day.
features: Access to sessions on selected day
info: The Single Day Pass lets you experience the conference for a day. Attend the sessions of your choice and make meaningful connections in a short time.

title: Speaker Pass
info: The Speaker Pass is reserved for conference speakers. As a speaker, you'll have full access to conference sessions, special privileges, and VIP areas.

title: Exhibitor Pass
description: For exhibitors showcasing at the conference.
info: The Exhibitor Pass is designed for exhibitors showcasing their products or services at the conference. It includes access to sessions, exhibitor booth space, and exposure to conference attendees.

title: Senior Pass
info: The Senior Pass offers a discounted rate for attendees aged 60 or older. Join us and connect with fellow freelancers while enjoying valuable sessions tailored to your needs.
